title: FS: T206 Joss Pitching Old Mill BVG 4
author: Natedog

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Joss Pitching Old Mill BVG 4
posts.post_content: For sale is a T206 Addie Joss Pitching Old Mill back, BVG 4.  Nice card, but there's a hairline crack in the bottom right part (front) of the slab.  Price is SOLD with free shipping.  Claim in the thread.  PM me for better pics.  Thanks for looking!
Pic of the crack in slab
